::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod flyes off, but stops, and looks back. Most of the bots were
retreating, but ArcAngel was still at it. Why couldn't he follow orders?
Hot Rod opened a comlink.
"Arc, Prowl said to leave, now move you're spark."
Hot Rod then continued on his way, to his transport ship.
There was a project for him to work on.
